title: your account is in the process of transferring. please try again in a few minutes league of legends
body:
Hello.
I have a problem because I can not log in to the site.
And my client pops up. Your account is in the process of transferring
Please help because I spent a lot of money and now I do not know what to do.

summ name : mute all randoms

replies.body:
It looks like that account was transferred over to the NA region, so make sure you're choosing the correct region on the client when you login. 

If you weren't the one who transferred that account, you should reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) asap. Make sure to pick "I need help recovering my account" and they'll be able to help ^_^!
